resources.string: For New Users: All the users will receive an envelope from AP Government instructing them to use the new T-card facilities offered by the government for the convenient transaction of money between the bus conductors and the individuals. There is a unique user id and hidden passwords in enclosed envelope.The users must first login with credentials endorsed in the envelope and later they can change their user id and password as their wish. Note:Do not reveal the password to any other persons,organisations.Incase of any negligence, legal actions will be taken and a fine of Rs.50000 will be charged for the guilts.
